text: Oscar Tietz (18 April 1858 – 17 January 1923) was a Jewish-German businessman (Unternehmer). ==Biography== Oscar Tietz was born in Birnbaum/Warthe, Posen on 18 April 1858. A nephew of Hermann Tietz, he joined his uncle's department store concern in Berlin. The two became founders of the Hertie, KaDeWe. Oscar Tietz died in Klosters, Switzerland in January 1923 at age 64. ==See also== * Leonhard Tietz * Hermann Tietz ==References== Category:1858 births Category:1923 deaths Category:People from Międzychód Category:Businesspeople from Berlin Category:People from the Province of Posen Category:20th-century German businesspeople Category:German businesspeople in retailing
title: Oscar Tietz
